import { useState } from "react" import { useImmer } from "use-immer" const FolderScreen = (props) =>{ const [value, setValue] = useState('') const n = props.notesInFolders.filter((el) => el.id == props.sd) const new_n = n.map(n=>n.notes.map(e=>)) return(
{setValue(e.target.value)}}>
{new_n}
) } export default FolderScreen
